title: Bad picture bleg
author: VD
content_html:
Does anyone have an idea why my Sony Cybershot DSC-P150 (7.2 megapixels) tends to take blurry pictures? I don’t know if I have the settings wrong or what, but if there’s any movement at all, the whole thing just blurs, especially if the flash is on.

Any suggestions?
content_text:
Does anyone have an idea why my Sony Cybershot DSC-P150 (7.2 megapixels) tends to take blurry pictures?  I don’t know if I have the settings wrong or what, but if there’s any movement at all, the whole thing just blurs, especially if the flash is on.
Any suggestions?
